description:
Compassionate, knowledgeable, proven: Our team at Spiros Law, P.C., successfully handles personal injury cases for people in Champaign and throughout Central Illinois. Our law firm has an established reputation for getting results. In fact, over just the past 10 years, we have put more than $100 million back into the hands of people who have suffered due to incidents such as car accidents, nursing home abuse, defective devices and medical malpractice.

Some of our law firm's most notable accomplishments include the following:

  • A $3.3 million award on behalf of an 80-year-old who experienced medical negligence
  • A $1.4 million award following a trucking accident that claimed the life of a teenager
  • A $9.8 million award on behalf of an 11-month-old, marking one of the largest verdicts in Vermilion

These and many others are why we have earned recognition such as an Avvo "Superb" rating; being named Super Lawyers; and being members of the Million Dollar Advocates Forum.

Starting with the free initial consultation, clients can expect professionalism from our team. We uphold the highest standards when it comes to the work we do. Using every resource at our disposal, we carefully craft individualized plans that set our clients up for success.

Spiros Law, P.C., has three locations across Illinois. Our law firm also has an online chat available around the clock where people are able to secure help.
